This code fetches papers from the OpenAlex API using keyword ChatGPT.

# Load packages and settings
```{r set.env}
# load packages
library('openalexR')
library('tidyverse')
library("jsonlite")

# specify API mailing key (if applicable)
# options(openalexR.mailto = "insert email here")
```

# Download records from API
```{r download}
# download raw data
DF <- 
  oa_fetch(entity = "works",
           search = "ChatGPT",
           output = "list"
           )

# export raw data
saveRDS(DF,
        "data/cgpt/btmpact24e_data_raw_cgpt.Rds")

# export binded data
DF <- DF %>% 
  works2df() 

DF %>% 
  saveRDS(
    file.path(data_dir,
              'cgpt',
              'btmobile25a_data_binded_cgpt.Rds')
          )
```

# Export DOI's for Altmetric pulls
```{r}
# select variables of interest
DF %>% 
  select(id, doi) %>%
  
  # filter complete records
  filter(doi != "") %>% 
  
write.csv("data/cgpt/btmpact24e_data_doi_cgpt.csv",
          row.names = F)
```
